#summary Controllers are used to control [Mechanism mechanisms]

= Introduction =

Controllers are used to control [Mechanism mechanisms]. They contain all of the logic necessary to tell a [Mechanism] what to do. For example, a kicker [Mechanism] might have to turn a motor until a limit switch is hit. The Controller of that [Mechanism] would contain the necessary if-then statement.
